review: Goodbye cable and long commercials! Hello wider choices and more savings. Thank you Amazon, for making this available. Easy to use and I am of the pre-tech age.

review: All things should work with the ease of the fire stick, nothing could have been simpler. Just perfect, select with ease the almost infinite choices of prime. Better than cable!!!!! Finally instructions that really worked. You will not be disappointed one bit.

review: I bought this for the little TV I just got for my kitchen so that I could binge watch Netflix while cooking and cleaning.  I already had a Google Chrome for another TV in the house and decided to give this a try, because you don't need to always have your mobile device on hand to use it.  I am liking using the remotes for this much better than my mobile devices for Chrome.  However, I have not yet tried it out with anything other than Netflix.
author: Jamie
